question: Which areas do you clean?
answer: We focus our cleaning service to the north and north west side of Sydney. The area highlighted within the red oval is where we focus our cleaning service. If you are on the edge of the circle feel free to contact us to verify whether we service your area.

question: Do I have to be present for a cleaning?
answer: No you do not have to be present while we clean. In fact many of our clients trust us with their key and go on with their day knowing that they'll come to a beautifully cleaned home.

question: Do you charge per hour?
answer: No. We believe in doing the job quickly but properly so you can get on with your day.

question: What is a Spring Clean (aka Deep Clean)?
answer: A spring/deep clean is a thorough top to bottom clean where your furniture is still present. This is a highly customizable service where you can select which options you'd like. We highly recommend this service for first-time customers or customers who haven't had their home professionally cleaned in the last three months. To see the extra things we do for deep cleans check out our services section.
